name: Andrew's Day Off
description:
It's Andrew's day off, and he is going to do something about it.

Stroll around the wonderful looking Rocktown in this comedic short adventure.

Poke around! look for items to help you achieve the five endings!

Listen to the four in-game tracks that come with the game!

Estimated playtime of 30 minutes for all endings. 

CHANGELOG 1.1
-------------------------------
New Title Screen
Added signposting for players to obtain endings 2 and 3 easier.
Fixed typo in ending 2's credits.
Renamed rooms
-Strange Tent is now Strange Room
-Friend's Outside is now Friend's Place
-Friend's Home is now Gorgo's Living Room
Made ending 5 much more difficult to obtain to make it more likely for players to finish the first 4 endings before ending 5.
Secret room added!
New music track added!
Added new readables!
File size cut down by a third
